00027 public class SQLiteDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {

00029     private Set<String> systemTables = new HashSet<String>();

00032         systemTables.add("sqlite_sequence");

00061     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00062         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:sqlite:")) {
00063             return "SQLite.JDBCDriver";
00064         }
00065         return null;
00066     }

00080     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn)
00081             throws JDBCException {
00082         return "SQLite".equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00083     }

00113     public String getTrigger(String table, String column) {
00114         return "CREATE TRIGGER insert_" + table + "_timeEnter AFTER  INSERT ON " + table + " BEGIN" +
00115                 " UPDATE " + table + " SET " + column + " = DATETIME('NOW')" +
00116                 " WHERE rowid = new.rowid END ";
00117     }

00120         return "";
00121     }

00123     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00124         String type;
00125         if (columnType.equals("INTEGER") ||
00126                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("int") ||
00127                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("bit")) {
00128             type = "INTEGER";
00129         } else if (columnType.equals("TEXT") ||
00130                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("uuid") ||
00131                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("uniqueidentifier") ||
00132 
00133                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).equals("uniqueidentifier") ||
00134                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).equals("datetime") ||
00135                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("timestamp") ||
00136                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("char") ||
00137                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("clob") ||
00138                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("text")) {
00139             type = "TEXT";
00140         } else if (columnType.equals("REAL") ||
00141                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("float")) {
00142             type = "REAL";
00143         } else if (columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("blob") ||
00144                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("binary")) {
00145             type = "BLOB";
00146         } else if (columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("boolean") ||
00147                 columnType.toLowerCase(Locale.ENGLISH).contains("binary")) {
00148             type = "BOOLEAN";
00149         } else {
00150             type = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00151         }
00152         return type;
00153     }
00154 
00155     public static Collection<SqlStatement> getAlterTableStatements(
00156             AlterTableVisitor alterTableVisitor,
00157             Database database, String schemaName, String tableName)
00158             throws UnsupportedChangeException, JDBCException {
00159 
00160         Collection<SqlStatement> statements = new Vector<SqlStatement>();
00161 
00162         DatabaseSnapshot snapshot = new SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot(database);
00163         Table table = snapshot.getTable(tableName);
00164 
00165         List<ColumnConfig> createColumns = new Vector<ColumnConfig>();
00166         List<ColumnConfig> copyColumns = new Vector<ColumnConfig>();
00167         if (table != null) {
00168             for (Column column : table.getColumns()) {
00169                 ColumnConfig new_column = new ColumnConfig(column);
00170                 if (alterTableVisitor.createThisColumn(new_column)) {
00171                     createColumns.add(new_column);
00172                 }
00173                 ColumnConfig copy_column = new ColumnConfig(column);
00174                 if (alterTableVisitor.copyThisColumn(copy_column)) {
00175                     copyColumns.add(copy_column);
00176                 }
00177             }
00178         }
00179         for (ColumnConfig column : alterTableVisitor.getColumnsToAdd()) {
00180             ColumnConfig new_column = new ColumnConfig(column);
00181             if (alterTableVisitor.createThisColumn(new_column)) {
00182                 createColumns.add(new_column);
00183             }
00184             ColumnConfig copy_column = new ColumnConfig(column);
00185             if (alterTableVisitor.copyThisColumn(copy_column)) {
00186                 copyColumns.add(copy_column);
00187             }
00188         }
00189 
00190         List<Index> newIndices = new Vector<Index>();
00191         for (Index index : snapshot.getIndexes()) {
00192             if (index.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(tableName)) {
00193                 if (alterTableVisitor.createThisIndex(index)) {
00194                     newIndices.add(index);
00195                 }
00196             }
00197         }
00198 
00199         // rename table
00200         String temp_table_name = tableName + "_temporary";
00201         statements.add(new RenameTableStatement(schemaName, tableName, temp_table_name));
00202         // create temporary table
00203         CreateTableChange ct_change_tmp = new CreateTableChange();
00204         ct_change_tmp.setSchemaName(schemaName);
00205         ct_change_tmp.setTableName(tableName);
00206         for (ColumnConfig column : createColumns) {
00207             ct_change_tmp.addColumn(column);
00208         }
00209         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(ct_change_tmp.generateStatements(database)));
00210         // copy rows to temporary table
00211         statements.add(new CopyRowsStatement(temp_table_name, tableName, copyColumns));
00212         // delete original table
00213         statements.add(new DropTableStatement(schemaName, temp_table_name, false));
00214         // validate indices
00215         statements.add(new ReindexStatement(schemaName, tableName));
00216         // add remaining indices
00217         for (Index index_config : newIndices) {
00218             statements.add(new CreateIndexStatement(
00219                     index_config.getName(),
00220                     schemaName, tableName,
00221                     index_config.isUnique(),
00222                     index_config.getColumns().
00223                             toArray(new String[index_config.getColumns().size()])));
00224         }
00225 
00226         return statements;
00227     }
00228 
00229     public String getConnectionUsername() throws JDBCException {
00230         try {
00231             String username = getConnection().getMetaData().getUserName();
00232             if (username == null) {
00233                 username = "liquibase";
00234             }
00235             return username;
00236         } catch (SQLException e) {
00237             throw new JDBCException(e);
00238         }
00239     }
00240 
00241     protected Set<String> getSystemTablesAndViews() {
00242         return systemTables;
00243     }
00244 
00245     public String getDateLiteral(java.sql.Timestamp date) {
00246         return getDateLiteral(new ISODateFormat().format(date).replaceFirst("^'", "").replaceFirst("'$", ""));
00247     }
00248 
00249 
00250     public interface AlterTableVisitor {
00251         public ColumnConfig[] getColumnsToAdd();
00252 
00253         public boolean copyThisColumn(ColumnConfig column);
00254 
00255         public boolean createThisColumn(ColumnConfig column);
00256 
00257         public boolean createThisIndex(Index index);
00258     }
00259 
00260     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00261         return new SQLiteDatabaseSnapshot(this);
00262     }
